name: Pots Dealer
description:
POTS DEALER

Here at the alchemist market, come and pick your poison,

You are a lovely unkown creature selling pots to weird people that don't seems to be from around here, but that's not of your buisness whoever they are, you have to serve them Customer is King or something like that.

! THE ALCHEMIST MARKET IS HIRING !

Be aware that we don't serve potions that aren't fresh, customers will only take a potion if you finished it in front of their eyes, and we are eco friendly we don't tolerate waste around here throwing potions equals to not be able to serve a customer but, sometimes you will need to if you don't organise yourself right.
